release.description: This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 6.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 6.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 5.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 5.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added a convenience method to the Registry Client for retrieving an Extrinsic by LIDVID.

release.description: This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 5.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Fixed a typo in the documentation.

release.description: This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 4.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Remove workaround for registry service emitting HTTP 500 for "not found" instead of 404 (PDS-29). Add implementation for ExtrinsicObject in model and in net. Replaced old "A and B or C" expressions with safer "B if A else C" expressions.

release.description: This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 3.1.1 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Minor updates related to packaging of the software.

release.description: This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: This release makes the client API compatible with the 1.2.0 release of the Registry Service. In particular, it fixes the integration of the Maven-provided project information with Python's Distribute-supplied project metadata.
Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Registry Client is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Initial release of the Python-based interface to the Registry Service.
